parties.raw_snippet: Blackstone / GSO Long-Short Credit Income Fund, a Delaware statutory trust (“Client”) and Mellon Investor Services LLC (operating with the service name BNY Mellon Shareowner Services), a New Jersey limited liability company (“Agent”)
parties.reasoning: The introductory paragraph explicitly identifies the two entities entering into the agreement and their designated roles as 'Client' and 'Agent'.
normalized_value: Blackstone / GSO Long-Short Credit Income Fund

contract_type.raw_snippet: SERVICE AGREEMENT FOR TRANSFER AGENT SERVICES
contract_type.reasoning: The title of the document clearly states 'SERVICE AGREEMENT FOR TRANSFER AGENT SERVICES,' which accurately reflects the primary purpose of the contract.

notice_period.raw_snippet: at least 60 days prior to the end of the Initial Term, or any successive three-year term
notice_period.reasoning: Section 2, 'Term of Agreement,' specifies that termination notice must be given 'at least 60 days prior' to the end of the current term to prevent automatic renewal.

expiration_date.raw_snippet: and shall continue for three years thereafter (the “Initial Term”).
expiration_date.reasoning: Section 2, 'Term of Agreement,' explicitly states that the agreement shall continue for 'three years' after the 'Effective Date,' establishing the initial term's duration.

renewal_term.raw_snippet: this Agreement shall automatically renew for successive additional three-year terms
renewal_term.reasoning: Section 2, 'Term of Agreement,' clearly states that the agreement will 'automatically renew for successive additional three-year terms' unless terminated.
